events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for several days.
The system classified this case as a Delivery Delay based on the customer's report about late shipping and tracking issues.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah B. for further investigation and customer assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I'll be happy to assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide your order number and the name under which the order was placed so I can check the latest status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the order was made under the name John Smith.
I checked your shipment, and it seems there is a delay with the courier. We expect delivery within 3 business days. We will monitor and notify you immediately upon arrival.
Thank you for the update. While it's disappointing to wait longer, I appreciate your help in keeping me informed.
Your order has now been delivered according to the courier's confirmation. Please let us know if there are any further problems.
We wanted to follow up to ensure your order arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing the case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
